name: Shogi
description:
Looking for a little board game fun? Try your hand at Shogi, a Japanese game that is similar to chess, but has an important strategic difference: game pieces you eliminate become yours to control. Do you have what it takes to capture your opponents King and become a Shogi champion?

Recommended for one or two players and playable using a single PSP® system.

Download Shogi today!



"PSP" is a registered trademark of Sony Computer Entertainment Inc.
